content.question: Which of the following best describes the French Edict of Nantes (1598) ?

choices.label: It provided limited political and religious liberties for French Huguenots.
It signaled the end of French territorial expansion for a century.
It led to the establishment of French colonies in North America.
It granted legal equality to all classes in France,
It led to fifty years of violent peasant rebellions.

content.answer: It provided limited political and religious liberties for French Huguenots.

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain a historical concept, development, or process.
